mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET quantity = #{quantity} WHERE productId = #{productId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE productId = #{productId} AND userId = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT c.userId, c.productId, c.quantity, p.productName, p.price, p.quantity"productQuantity" ,img.imagePath FROM cart c LEFT JOIN product p ON c.productId= p.productId LEFT JOIN product_image img ON p.productId = img.productId WHERE userId = #{userId} AND imageType LIKE CONCAT('%', "PRODUCT", '%')
